<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Spirit Spells](/Feats.aspx?ID=2280) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #163: Ruins of Gauntlight](/Sources.aspx?ID=71) pg. 81</row>

**Archetype** [Ghost Hunter](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=88)

**Prerequisites**
[Ghost Hunter Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=2277)

</column>

---

Your ability to confront incorporeal menaces develops into full-fledged spellcasting. Choose a 1st-level occult spell. You can Cast this Spell as an innate occult spell. At 6th level, you gain a 2nd-level occult spell, and at 8th level, you gain a 3rd-level occult spell. Each of these spells must have the [divination](/Traits.aspx?ID=47), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), or [necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117) trait. You can cast each of these spells once per day.
name: Spirit Spells
